description: Disable submit button during execution. Show 'Running...' status. Optimistic update: add pending submission to history immediately. Update with real results when complete.

description: Use react-calendar-heatmap library. Show daily activity: solved (green), attempted (yellow), missed (gray). Show on ProfilePage. Display stats: current streak, longest streak, total days active.

description: Update all executors to measure peak memory accurately. Use cgroups v2 memory.peak or sample /proc/self/status VmPeak every 10ms during execution. Handle OOM kills.

description: Test submission flow for Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, Rust, Go. Test edge cases: empty code, syntax errors, infinite loops. Verify submissions saved. Load test: 10 concurrent submissions.

description: Update all executors to use cgroups v2 memory.peak (/sys/fs/cgroup/memory.peak) or sample VmPeak regularly. Measure peak not current. Handle OOM kill scenarios.
